Introduction

Wen Junhui , also known by his stage name Jun, is a Chinese singer, dancer, actor, songwriter and composer under Pledis Entertainment. He the main dancer and sub vocalist of the South Korean boy group SEVENTEEN and its sub-unit SVT PERFORMANCE Team. He is also best known for starring in the 2023 Chinese drama "Exclusive Fairy Tale".

Before joining SEVENTEEN, he was a child actor who starred in multiple films including The Pye Dog (2006), for which he won the Hong Kong Film Directors' Guild's Best New Actor Silver Award. In 2010, he played the young Ip Man in The Legend Is Born: Ip Man. Eventually, Jun debuted as a member of SEVENTEEN on May 26, 2015, with the EP 17 Carat.

On August 12, 2024, it was announced Jun would be going on hiatus to focus on his acting career in China. He will not be active in SEVENTEEN's world tour or promotions for the rest of 2024 due to this.
